{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$35.4M in 2021-2022** on contracts with COMPUCOM CANADA.

Across 275 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 25 have at least one amendment (9%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 13% and the average number of amendments was 1.08. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$1.5M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 2.19 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$740.6K. The longest contract was 10.01 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$17.0M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
